body: You know, I don't even blame the MILF in this one. Yeah it's pretty fucked up in general but if she was on a deserted island long enough it makes sense that she would start to lose all attachments like to her husband and son. At that point when hope is lost she would cling to the man she's trapped with and form a very strong attachment with him instead.  Being rescued doesn't change that. Fair enough, MILF-chan did nothing wrong
